TextBody:
Hello Cristian,

Thank you for allowing us to assist you in today's remote session.

To recap what we did during the remote session:

1.We created a copy of the backup from the old server through the backend.
2.We imported it on the new server successfully.
3. We checked the users/computers/ server maintenance and everything looks in place.

We have asked Daniel to monitor the new server and let us know in case anything comes up so that we can assist further with the problem.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: 19 March, 2025 16:53
To: Suport IT <suport.it@nndkp.ro>
Subject: RE: 00435998 - Procedure for migrating from Ubuntu 14.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Virtual Appliance

Hello Cristian,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00435998. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00435998
Ticket Subject: Procedure for migrating from Ubuntu 14.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Virtual Appliance
Ticket Details: Hello. What's the procedure from upgrading from the virtual appliance based on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS which is EOL to the one based on Ubuntu 22.04?

Thank you!
